categories.name: Appetizers
categories.description: Delicious starters to kick off your meal

categories.name: Main Courses
categories.description: Masterfully crafted dishes, delivered fresh for the discerning foodie.

categories.name: Desserts
categories.description: Decadent endings to your culinary journey

categories.name: Beverages
categories.description: Refreshing cold brews, crafted to energize your day.

items.name: Crispy Corn Chaat
items.description: Irresistibly spiced crispy corn, crafted for the ultimate snacking indulgence.

items.name: Potato Lollipop
items.description: Crispy golden potato lollipops, delicately spiced and served with a tangy house-made dip.

items.name: Paneer Seekh Kabab
items.description: Succulent paneer seekh kebabs, infused with aromatic spices and char-grilled to perfection.

items.name: Chicken Keema Kabab
items.description: Flavorful chicken keema, slow-cooked with a spices for a rich and hearty indulgence.

items.name: Kozhukattai Prawn
items.description: Handcrafted prawn kozhukattai, filled with spiced prawn goodness and steamed to perfection.

items.name: Fish Croquettes
items.description: Golden-fried fish croquettes, delicately seasoned and served with a zesty house-made dip.

items.name: Veg Dum Biryani
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice slow-cooked with garden-fresh vegetables, aromatic spices, and saffron, sealed to perfection in the traditional dum style.

items.name: Mushroom Rice
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice tossed with earthy mushrooms, herbs, and subtle spices that perfectly balances.

items.name: Soya Fried Rice
items.description: Wok-tossed rice with nutritious soya chunks, fresh vegetables, and aromatic seasonings for a wholesome indulgence.

items.name: Chicken Dum Biryani
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice slow-cooked with tender chicken, aromatic spices, and saffron, sealed to perfection in the traditional dum style.

items.name: Mutton Dum Biryani
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice slow-cooked with succulent mutton, aromatic spices, and saffron, sealed to perfection in the traditional dum style.

items.name: Egg Biryani
items.description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced boiled eggs, infused with saffron and slow-cooked to perfection in the traditional dum style.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked layers, creamy mascarpone, and a dusting of cocoa.

items.name: Macarons
items.description: Exquisite French macarons, crafted with almond meringue shells and filled with silky, flavorful ganache and creams, offering a perfect balance.

items.name: Baklava
items.description: Layers of flaky pastry filled with nuts and sweetened with golden honey syrup, creating a indulgence of rich flavors and delicate crunch.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Classic vanilla, lavender honey, and espresso crème brûlée with seasonal berries

items.name: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Soft, golden dumplings soaked in fragrant rose-infused syrup, offering a melt-in-the-mouth.

items.name: Mochi
items.description: Delicate Japanese rice cakes with a soft, chewy texture, filled with luscious sweet centers.

items.name: Mocha Frappe
items.description: A chilled blend of rich espresso, velvety chocolate, and creamy milk, topped with whipped cream for the perfect indulgent sip.

items.name: Iced Caramel
items.description: Smooth espresso poured over ice, swirled with creamy milk and golden caramel for a refreshing, sweet indulgence.

items.name: Coconut Cold
items.description: Chilled cold brew blended with creamy coconut, delivering a tropical twist to your coffee experience.

items.name: Coffee Lemonade
items.description: A bold fusion of rich cold brew and zesty lemonade, creating a refreshing balance of citrus and coffee.

items.name: longisland
items.description: A timeless classic cocktail blending vodka, rum, gin, tequila, and triple sec, balanced with a splash of cola and citrus.

items.name: Mint Iced
items.description: Chilled coffee infused with refreshing mint, perfectly balanced for a cool and energizing indulgence.
